sabbathSchool.topic: The Lord Is Robed in Majesty

announcements.additionalInfo: Please contact Sis. Stacy or Sis. Karen directly or respond to the text message that was sent out.

notes: *If you are a guest, please sign the guest book in the front*
*After Lunch every Sabbath will be Vespers*
*Prayer Meeting every first Monday of the month at 7pm on Zoom*
